main.name: Athena Gardner
main.bio1: As a long-time gamer & passionate developer, I am looking forward to continuing my career in game and software development. I would love the opportunity to be more involved in production and/or automated testing & quality assurance.
main.bio2: Aside from gaming, I enjoy creative activities, gardening, paddle boarding and spending time with my friends, family and cat.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out on LinkedIn or contact me via email or text.

work.title: Intermediate Backend/Dev Ops Developer
work.description: Through working mainly on the upcoming Blackout Football Manager game, I've loved working alongside backend, design, UI & frontend teams to resolve issues & to create a game we can all be proud of. I've been working on new and existing features for both the new football game & the existing Blackout Rugby Manager game. I'm especially proud of my work on getting the more complicated football gameplans integrated with existing systems.

work.title: Technical Writer
work.description: Designing and finalising documentation for internal and external use and assisting in developing new processes.

work.title: Various positions
work.description: I fulfilled various positions from Order Picker to Store Manager and while I was studying I filled roles on an as-needed, where-needed basis, including but not limited to Data Entry Clerk, Technical Writer, SME and Project Liaison Officer. I worked closely, primarily with the marketing team and the purchasing team, as well as working remotely in an individual capacity.

volunteering.title: Youth Leader
volunteering.description: I worked in a team of wonderful youth leaders to plan, organise & run the youth group every week during the school terms. I focused on helping youth feel welcome, included and heard.

volunteering.title: Electrician Assistant
volunteering.description: I assisted in setting up campsite power & lighting in the week prior to camp and packing up in the few days after camp. I also turned on and off the lights at high foot traffic areas across camp (at Mystery Creek) in a timely manner every night.

resume.skillmessage: Over the years I have done a variety of projects throughout my education, professional life and personal time. I have a passion for learning and I enjoy taking on a challenge. React.js has been a challenge for me to learn so I chose to create this website using a React template and play around with it to familiarise myself with the structure more. As I am still learning and developing my skills I refer to documentation quite often especially for specific syntax. I have also used frameworks such as jest for testing.

projects.title: Blackout Football Manager
projects.description: This is a modern, multiplayer, social, world-class Football Manager Game! Take control of a novice club and fend your way to glory.

projects.title: My CV
projects.description: This website built using ReactJs, adapted from a Tim Baker project to suit my style & needs

projects.title: Birds Eye View
projects.description: A mobile application for birding I created individually in one of my classes, I will continue working on this as I want to actually use this application

projects.title: RiskTuit
projects.description: A website that is a Risk Management tool created for the client SevenBoxes in my Capstone Project at Unitec

projects.title: MelodyBridge
projects.description: A music streaming website utilizing Google web services that I developed within a team in a cloud application class

projects.title: Bubbles
projects.description: A team project of a social media website focused on keeping those in your community connected.
